content: Guarding the path to the last boss of the temple are two Dark-faced Overlords, and they won't be happy to see you. Expect at least one of them to toss a boulder at you, and you'll want to charge one as soon as possible to maximize the time you have 1v1 before the other arrives.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Inner Courtyard'.
The content is as follows:
Guarding the path to the last boss of the temple are two Dark-faced Overlords, and they won't be happy to see you. Expect at least one of them to toss a boulder at you, and you'll want to charge one as soon as possible to maximize the time you have 1v1 before the other arrives.
